Package com.arjuna.JDBC2

Interface Summary
ArjunaJDBC2DynamicClass This class is responsible for maintaining connection information in such a manner that we can recover the connection to the XA database in the event of a failure.
JDBC2Branding Connections may need to be branded in an implementation specific manner.
 

Class Summary
ArjunaJDBC2BrandingFactory Keep track of any "brandings" we may require.
ArjunaJDBC2Connection A transactional JDBC 2.0 connection.
ArjunaJDBC2Driver Transactional JDBC 2.0 driver.
ArjunaJDBC2DynamicRecoveryConnection This class is responsible for maintaining connection information in such a manner that we can recover the connection to the XA database in the event of a failure.
ArjunaJDBC2ModifierFactory Keep track of any "modifiers" we may require to run transactions over specific databases.
ArjunaJDBC2RecoveryConnection This class is responsible for maintaining connection information in such a manner that we can recover the connection to the XA database in the event of a failure.
Info Module specific implementation of the information object.
JDBC2Environment The module specific properties which can be set to configure the system at runtime.
